email_body: Just FYI, whether it matters or not, but commissions in gas average $3-4 a contract. Not sure about power. Andy Zipper@ENRON 08/28/2000 04:10 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT, Mike Maggi/Corp/Enron@Enron cc: Subject: commissions saved While we are putting this card together I thougth you guys might like to see some of the imputed commission numbers.......I thought we would cut it off at $100,000 saved. I'm using an average rate of $10 per 10,000 mmbtu gas and power equivalent.
